title: A Hole in the Head (James Strait mysteries Book 3)
features: 100% human-written!  They drove James Strait out of the FBI because he wouldn't follow the rules. Now they want him back to hunt down a monster who killed eleven immigrants in the Arizona desert.
description: "I read hundreds of books a year but few have captured my absolute and undivided attention as much as A Hole in the Head did....one of the best books I've read in a long time."
"A thoroughly enjoyable mystery thriller, with a strong protagonist and a cleverly crafted plot." -

"In A Hole in the Head, John Eidswick combines a hero's journey with a chilling mystery, hatching a cautionary tale about the ruthlessness of both the desert, and the people who break up its landscape. A master of red herrings and swooshing curveballs, the author offers a look at psychological oddities that appear as disturbing as they are compelling." -
"A multilayered investigative tale with plenty of action and comic relief." -
